Wheels 17

AXLE SHAFT MOUNTING STUD (AXLE SHAFT REMOVED), Replace

Excludes:
1. AXLE SHAFT AND/OR GASKET, R & R AND/OR REPLACE

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Stud A17-170 All Models 0.3
Each Additional A17-171 All Models 0.2

Notes:
1. Refer to Group 04, Replace Brake Drum

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours

Notes:
1. Refer to Group 04, Replace Brake Rotor

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A17-001 All Models 0.0

CAST SPOKE WHEEL MOUNTING STUD, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Stud A17-180 All Models 0.4
Each Additional A17-181 All Models 0.2

FRONT WHEEL HUB (DISC AND CAST SPOKE WHEEL), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. R&R caliper, rotor/hub assembly and wheel seal
4. Install new ABS exciter ring if necessary
5. Adjust wheel bearings and check/fill lube
6. Adjust brakes on axle being serviced

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Drum Brakes One Wheel A17-100 All Models 1.2
Drum Brakes One Axle, Both Wheels A17-101 All Models 1.9
Caliper Disc Brake One Wheel A17-102 All Models 1.2
Caliper Disc Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A17-103 All Models 2.0

REAR WHEEL HUB (DISC AND CAST SPOKE WHEEL), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. R&R axle shaft, caliper, rotor or drum and wheel seal
4. Install new ABS exciter ring if necessary
5. Adjust wheel bearings and check/fill lube
6. Adjust brakes on axle being serviced

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Drum Brake One Wheel A17-120 All Models 1.4
Drum Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A17-121 All Models 2.1
Caliper Disc Brake One Wheel A17-122 All Models 1.6
Caliper Disc Brake One Axle, Both Wheels A17-123 All Models 2.5

WHEEL MOUNTING STUD (DISC WHEEL), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. R&R hub cap/gasket
4. R&R axle shaft and gasket when required
5. R&R caliper, rotor/hub assembly and wheel seal
6. Adjust wheel bearings and check/fill lube
7. Adjust brakes (drum brakes only)

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Front Wheel - Drum Brake One Bolt A17-140 All Models 1.3
Front Wheel - Caliper Disc Brake One Bolt A17-141 All Models 1.5
Rear Wheel - Drum Brake One Bolt A17-142 All Models 1.4
Rear Wheel - Caliper Disc Brake One Bolt A17-143 All Models 1.7
Each Additional Stud A17-144 All Models 0.1

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A17-T1 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A17-T2 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A17-T3 All Models 0.0
